name: Automated Job Extraction & Publishing with RAG, Jina AI and OpenAI to WordPress
description:
Auto repost job with RAG is a workflow designed to automatically extract, process, and publish job listings from monitored sources using Google Drive, OpenAI, Supabase, and WordPress. This integration streamlines job reposting by intelligently extracting relevant job data, mapping categories and types accurately, managing media assets, and publishing posts seamlessly.

## üí° Why Use Auto repost job with RAG?

**Automated Publishing:** Slash manual entry time by automating job post extraction and publication, freeing hours every week.

**Error-Resistant Workflow:** Avoid incomplete job posts with smart validation checks to ensure all necessary fields are ready before publishing.

**Consistent Content Quality:** Maintain formatting, SEO, and style consistency backed by AI-driven article regeneration adhering strictly to your guidelines.

**Competitive Edge:** Get fresh jobs live faster than your competitors without lifting more than a finger‚Äîbecause robots don't take coffee breaks!

## ‚ö° Perfect For

**Recruiters & HR Teams:** Accelerate your job posting funnel with error-free automation.

**Content Managers:** Keep your job boards fresh with AI-enriched standardized listings.

**Digital Marketers:** Automate content flows to boost SEO and engagement without the headache.

## üîß How It Works

**‚è± Trigger:** Job link inputs via Telegram.

**üìé Process:** Auto-download of job documents, data extraction using Jina AI and OpenAI's GPT-4 model to parse content and metadata.

**ü§ñ Smart Logic:** AI agent regenerates articles based on strict RAG dataset rules; category & job type IDs mapped to match WordPress taxonomy; fallback attempts with default images for missing logos.

**üíå Output:** Job posts formatted and published to WordPress; success or failure updates sent back via Telegram notifications.

**üóÇ Storage:** Uses Supabase vector store for document embedding and retrieval related to formatting rules and job data.

## üîê Quick Setup

1. Import the provided JSON workflow into your [n8n instances](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/khmuhtadin)
2. **Add credentials:** Google Drive OAuth, OpenAI API, Supabase API, Telegram API, WordPress API
3. **Customize:** Set your Google Drive folder ID, WordPress endpoints, and Telegram chat IDs
4. **Update:** Confirm default logo URLs and fallback settings as needed
5. **Test:** Submit a new job link via Telegram or add a file to the watched Drive folder

## üß© You'll Need

- Active [n8n instances](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/khmuhtadin)
- Google Drive Account with OAuth2 credentials
- OpenAI API access for GPT-4 processing
- Supabase account configured for vector storage
- WordPress API credentials for job listing publishing
- Telegram Bot for notifications and job link inputs

## üõ†Ô∏è Level Up Ideas

- Integrate Slack, Gmail or Teams notifications for teams visibility
- Add a sentiment analysis step to prioritize certain jobs
- Automate social media posting of new job listings for wider reach

---

**Made by:** [Khmuhtadin](https://khmuhtadin.com)  
**Tags:** automation, job-posting, AI, OpenAI, Google Drive, WordPress  
**Category:** content automation  
**Need custom work?** [Contact me](https://khmuhtadin.com/contact)

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

options.systemMessage:
=Eres un regenerador de art√≠culos especializado que trabaja exclusivamente con informaci√≥n y reglas almacenadas en la base de conocimientos "notodoanimacion".
Funci√≥n Principal
Regenerar art√≠culos siguiendo estrictamente las reglas de formato, estilo y estructura definidas en el dataset RAG. No inventes reglas ni formatos propios.
Protocolo de Trabajo
1. Consulta Obligatoria

SIEMPRE usa la herramienta "notodoanimacion" para buscar:

Reglas de formato y estructura de art√≠culos
Gu√≠as de estilo de escritura
Ejemplos de formato correcto
Informaci√≥n relevante sobre el tema solicitado

2. Cumplimiento Estricto
Sigue EXACTAMENTE las reglas de formato encontradas en el dataset
Respeta las gu√≠as de estilo definidas en la base de conocimientos
Aplica la estructura de art√≠culos especificada en el RAG
Mant√©n el tono y estilo establecido en las directrices

3. Proceso de Regeneraci√≥n
Busca las reglas de formato en la base de conocimientos
Busca informaci√≥n sobre el tema solicitado
Aplica las reglas encontradas al contenido
Regenera el art√≠culo siguiendo exactamente esas especificaciones


Importante
NO crees reglas propias de formato
NO improvises estructura de art√≠culos
TODO debe basarse en lo que encuentres en "notodoanimacion"
Si no encuentras reglas espec√≠ficas, pregunta al usuario por m√°s detalles

Idioma
Trabaja principalmente en espa√±ol, adapt√°ndote al tono y registro encontrado en el dataset.
Responde siempre consultando primero la base de conocimientos para obtener las reglas correctas.

parameters.toolDescription: use thisto get information about notodoanimacion

parameters.jsCode:
// 1. Ambil array kategori dari input
const inputCategories = $('üß† Extract Job Data with GPT').first().json.choices[0].message.content.categories;

// 1b. Ambil job_type sebagai satu string
const inputType = $('üß† Extract Job Data with GPT').first().json.choices[0].message.content.job_type;

// 2. Array mapping antara `category` dan `id`
const categoryMap = [
  { id: 299, category: "2d" },
  { id: 298, category: "3d" },
  { id: 315, category: "3DFX" },
  { id: 284, category: "Animaci√≥n 2d" },
  { id: 286, category: "Animaci√≥n 3d" },
  { id: 617, category: "Artista de color" },
  { id: 312, category: "Audio SFX" },
  { id: 540, category: "character artist" },
  { id: 445, category: "Character FX (CFX)" },
  { id: 596, category: "Cinematic Artist" },
  { id: 462, category: "Comic" },
  { id: 294, category: "Compositor 3d" },
  { id: 487, category: "Compositor Digital" },
  { id: 463, category: "Concept Art" },
  { id: 300, category: "Creativo" },
  { id: 537, category: "Crowd Artist" },
  { id: 301, category: "Desarrollo de Software" },
  { id: 316, category: "Desarrollo Visual" },
  { id: 302, category: "Dibujante" },
  { id: 612, category: "Direcci√≥n" },
  { id: 292, category: "Director de Arte" },
  { id: 317, category: "Dise√±o de personajes" },
  { id: 291, category: "Dise√±o Gr√°fico" },
  { id: 310, category: "Edici√≥n de video" },
  { id: 533, category: "Environment Artist" },
  { id: 620, category: "Escultura Digital" },
  { id: 622, category: "Filmmaker" },
  { id: 304, category: "Fotograf√≠a" },
  { id: 314, category: "Game Artist" },
  { id: 486, category: "Game Designer" },
  { id: 506, category: "Game developer" },
  { id: 482, category: "Game Producer" },
  { id: 576, category: "Gameplay Animator" },
  { id: 290, category: "Generalista 3d" },
  { id: 452, category: "Grooming Hair/Fur" },
  { id: 303, category: "Guionista" },
  { id: 305, category: "Iluminaci√≥n" },
  { id: 288, category: "Ilustraci√≥n" },
  { id: 616, category: "Inteligencia Artificial" },
  { id: 311, category: "Layout Artist" },
  { id: 619, category: "Look Development" },
  { id: 464, category: "Matte Painting" },
  { id: 287, category: "Modelador 3d" },
  { id: 524, category: "Motion Designer" },
  { id: 289, category: "Motion Graphics" },
  { id: 588, category: "Pixel Art" },
  { id: 307, category: "Postproducci√≥n" },
  { id: 594, category: "Previs" },
  { id: 297, category: "Producci√≥n" },
  { id: 483, category: "Programador" },
  { id: 592, category: "Realidad Virtual (VR)" },
  { id: 448, category: "Render Wrangler" },
  { id: 313, category: "Rigger" },
  { id: 459, category: "Shading & Texturing" },
  { id: 295, category: "Storyboard" },
  { id: 296, category: "Storytelling" },
  { id: 595, category: "Technical Artist" },
  { id: 485, category: "Technical Director (TD)" },
  { id: 308, category: "UI / UX" },
  { id: 309, category: "VFX" },
  { id: 589, category: "Videojuegos" },
  { id: 593, category: "Virtual Production" },
  { id: 293, category: "Visualizaci√≥n Arquitect√≥nica" },
  { id: 590, category: "VR & AR" }
];

// 2b. Array mapping antara `type` dan `id`
const typeMap = [
  { "id": 282, "type": "Freelance / Remoto / Teletrabajo" },
  { "id": 318, "type": "Indiferente" },
  { "id": 283, "type": "Pr√°cticas" },
  { "id": 281, "type": "Proyecto" },
  { "id": 279, "type": "Tiempo completo" },
  { "id": 280, "type": "Tiempo parcial" }
];

// 3. Map kategori input ‚Üí array ID
const fixCategory = Array.isArray(inputCategories)
  ? inputCategories
      .map(name => {
        const match = categoryMap.find(obj => obj.category === name);
        return match ? match.id : null;
      })
      .filter(id => id !== null)
  : [];

// 4. Cari ID tipe berdasarkan inputType (string), balikan sebagai array
const foundType = typeMap.find(obj => obj.type === inputType);
const fixType = foundType ? [foundType.id] : [];

// 5. Kembalikan kedua array dalam satu objek JSON
return [
  {
    json: {
      fixCategory,
      fixType
    }
  }
];

values.content:
=You are a specialized article regenerator who works exclusively with information and rules stored in the "document" knowledge base. Extract rigorously the following fields from the provided job-offer HTML: ‚Ä¢ title ‚Ä¢ job_type ‚Ä¢ categories (array) ‚Ä¢ location (search in text of offer (body), or put "sin definir") ‚Ä¢ company ‚Ä¢ logo ‚Ä¢ original_link ({{ $('üîß Prepare URL for Extraction').item.json.message.text }}) ‚Ä¢ html (only the job description) Primary Function Regenerate articles strictly following the formatting, style, and structure rules defined in the RAG dataset. Do not invent your own rules or formats. Work Protocol 1. Mandatory Consultation ALWAYS use the "document" tool to search for: - Article formatting and structure rules - Writing style guides - Examples of correct formatting - Relevant information on the requested topic 2. Strict Compliance - Follow EXACTLY the formatting rules found in the dataset - Respect the style guides defined in the knowledge base - Apply the article structure specified in the RAG - Maintain the tone and style established in the guidelines 3. Regeneration Process - Search for formatting rules in the knowledge base - Search for information on the requested topic - Apply the rules found to the content - Regenerate the article following those specifications exactly Important DO NOT create your own formatting rules DO NOT improvise article structure EVERYTHING should be based on what you find in "document" If you don't find specific rules, ask the user for more details **HTML (DESCRIPCI√ìN)** 1. Al principio, escribe un resumen de dos l√≠neas de la oferta de empleo. Menciona la disciplina, el estudio que publica la oferta, y si es remoto o presencial, incluyendo la localizaci√≥n. Puedes a√±adir otros elementos relevantes si es necesario. **No a√±adas un t√≠tulo ni encabezado H2 para este p√°rrafo** y justifica el texto de cada p√°rrafo completo. Incluye solo un espacio: `

 

` 2. Despu√©s, a√±ade este c√≥digo: ```html

Si quieres m√°s ofertas de empleo de Animaci√≥n, 3D, VFX y Arte digitalüëà ENTRA AQU√ç

``` Incluye solo un espacio: `

 

` 3. Escribe lo siguiente: ```html

[divider style="normal" top="20" bottom="20"]

 

IMPORTANTE: Suscr√≠bete a nuestra p√°gina üëà Te enviaremos nuestras ofertas de empleo, todas las semanas. ‚ù§Ô∏è

 

[divider style="normal" top="20" bottom="20"]

``` Incluye un espacio: `

 

` 4. AHORA ESCRIBE TODO EL CONTENIDO EN HTML. **CONTENIDO:** ¬∑ Escribe SIEMPRE EN TERCERA PERSONA. ¬∑ No traduzcas t√©rminos t√©cnicos como Assets, technical director, senior, rigging, VFX, CGI, Motion Graphics, pipeline, etc. ¬∑ No traduzcas nombres de programas o herramientas, como After Effects, Photoshop, Shotgun, etc. ¬∑ **¬°No escribas ning√∫n tipo de informaci√≥n adicional!** **FORMATO:** ¬∑ Organiza el contenido utilizando encabezados H2 para cada secci√≥n, todos centrados. ¬∑ Justifica el texto de cada p√°rrafo completo. ¬∑ **SEO**: Usa negrita para los t√©rminos importantes utilizando etiquetas `` para optimizar la lectura y el SEO, siguiendo estrictamente el orden HTML. ¬∑ Utiliza listas con vi√±etas siempre que sea adecuado. ¬∑ TODOS los enlaces deben abrir en una nueva ventana. ¬∑ Usa negrita con etiquetas `` para los t√©rminos importantes y palabras clave para optimizar el SEO. ¬∑ Despu√©s de cada t√≠tulo, a√±ade `

 

` 5. Despu√©s del contenido, a√±ade este c√≥digo: ```html

Si quieres m√°s ofertas de empleo de Animaci√≥n, 3D, VFX y Arte digitalüëà ENTRA AQU√ç

``` 6. En la √∫ltima l√≠nea, incluye SIEMPRE un eslogan aleatorio. Usa negrita con `` y alinea el texto al centro. Elige **UNA** de estas cuatro opciones: **Bienvenido a yourwebsite.es | Tu web sobre Animaci√≥n, VFX y Arte Digital en habla Hispana.** **Bienvenidos Artistas Digitales a notodoanimacion.es | El portal de Animaci√≥n, 3D, VFX y Videojuegos que trabaja para ti.** **Bienvenido a notodoanimacion.es | El portal sobre animaci√≥n y arte digital en espa√±ol, m√°s visitado del mundo.** ----- Category Selection Rules: ‚Ä¢ ONLY select categories from this EXACT options: {{ $('üìö Load Valid Job Types & Categories').item.json.category.map(item => item.category) }} ‚Ä¢ Maximum 3 categories allowed ‚Ä¢ Must be CASE SENSITIVE - match exactly as written in the array ‚Ä¢ Select the 3 MOST RELEVANT categories that best match the extracted job ‚Ä¢ If fewer than 3 categories are relevant, select only the appropriate ones ‚Ä¢ DO NOT CREATE or ADD any categories outside the provided array ‚Ä¢ DO NOT MODIFY the spelling, capitalization, or format of categories Guidelines: ‚Ä¢ DO NOT INVENT ANYTHING ‚Ä¢ Write everything in Spanish (Castilian) ‚Ä¢ Structure the job description using H2 headings ‚Ä¢ Use strategic bolding for SEO and relevance ‚Ä¢ If any field is missing, leave it empty (‚Äù‚Äù or []) ‚Ä¢ Return only valid JSON Category Selection Process: 1. Read the job description carefully 2. Identify the main job functions and requirements 3. Match these against the provided category array 4. Select maximum 3 categories that are MOST APPROPRIATE 5. Ensure exact spelling and case matching from the array job_type Selection Rules: ‚Ä¢ THIS Field is a MANDATORY ‚Ä¢ ONLY select job_type from this EXACT options:{{ $('üìö Load Valid Job Types & Categories').item.json.types.map(item => item.type) }} ‚Ä¢ Maximum 1 Job type allowed ‚Ä¢ Must be CASE SENSITIVE‚Äîmatch exactly as written in the array ‚Ä¢ DO NOT CREATE or ADD any categories outside the provided array ‚Ä¢ DO NOT MODIFY the spelling, capitalization, or format of categories ‚Ä¢ IF there's no type directly stated, find on the body, find relevant details and pick the most appropriate
